title: mzPeak auxiliary data array
description: Describe the JSON format of auxliary data array

name.description: A controlled vocabulary term naming this data array. Must be a child of MS:1000513.

data.description: The encoded bytes of this array. They may be compressed or not according to `compression`. The binary data type is defined by `data_type`, is stored in little endian order. No base64 encoding is used.

data_type.description: The binary data type stored in this array's bytes, e.g. integer, float, ASCII string, encoded as a CURIE. Must be a child of MS:1000518.

compression.description: The compression method applied to this array's bytes, encoded as a CURIE. Must be a child of MS:1000572.

unit.description: The unit of the measurements in this array, encoded as a CURIE. Must be a child of UO:0000000.

parameters.description: Additional parameters describing this data array

data_processing_ref.description: The identifier for the data processing pipeline that created this array.
